We will build and deploy a static site that is backed by content on Postgres. We will also setup serverless automation so that whenever content changes on Postgres, we will re-render the site and deploy again with a maximum of one deploy every 5mins.

In 15 minutes, you will be witness to the raw awesomeness of having the flexibility of a dynamic website backed by a database with performance and scalability of a static website.

Recorded at JAMstack Conf 2018 in San Francisco. Learn about upcoming dates and locations at https://www.jamstackconf.com
